javadoc: A transferable for sharing data via drag/drop and clipboard operations for GTrees

methods.name: <init>
methods.comment:
Creates this transferable based upon the selected data and uses the given transfer
 handler to perform Transferable operations

params.name: handler
params.comment: the handler used to perform transfer operations

methods.javadoc:
Returns all of the original selected data contained by this transferable.
@return all of the original selected data contained by this transferable
methods.name: getAllData
methods.comment: Returns all of the original selected data contained by this transferable.

return.comment: all of the original selected data contained by this transferable

methods.name: getTransferData
methods.comment: Gets the transfer data from the selection based upon the given flavor

params.name: flavor
params.comment: The flavor of data to retrieve from the given selection.

throws.comment:
if the given flavor is not one of the supported flavors
 returned by #getTransferDataFlavors()

return.comment: the transfer data from the selection based upon the given flavor.

methods.javadoc:
Returns the DataFlavors for the types of data that this transferable supports, based upon
 the given selection
@return the DataFlavors for the types of data that this transferable supports, based upon
 the given selection
methods.name: getTransferDataFlavors
methods.comment:
Returns the DataFlavors for the types of data that this transferable supports, based upon
 the given selection

return.comment:
the DataFlavors for the types of data that this transferable supports, based upon
 the given selection

methods.javadoc:
A convenience method to determine if this transferable supports the given flavor
@return true if this transferable supports the given flavor
methods.name: isDataFlavorSupported
methods.comment: A convenience method to determine if this transferable supports the given flavor

return.comment: true if this transferable supports the given flavor

name: GTreeNodeTransferable
comment: A transferable for sharing data via drag/drop and clipboard operations for GTrees
